%% LyX 2.3.3 created this file.  For more info, see http://www.lyx.org/.
%% Do not edit unless you really know what you are doing.
\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{calc}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\global\long\def\V{\mathcal{V}}%
\global\long\def\F{\mathcal{F}}%
\global\long\def\K{K}%
\global\long\def\W{\mathcal{W}}%
\global\long\def\N{\mathcal{N}}%

\[
\left[\begin{array}{cccc}
J_{\N\N} & J_{\N\F} & J_{\N\K} & J_{\N\W}\\
J_{\F\N} & J_{\F\F} & J_{\F\K} & J_{\F\W}\\
J_{\K\N} & J_{\K\F} & J_{\K\K} & J_{\K\W}\\
J_{\W\N} & J_{\W\F} & J_{\W\K} & J_{\W\W}
\end{array}\right]
\]
\[
\left[\begin{array}{cccc}
J_{\N\N} & J_{\N\F} & J_{\N\K} & J_{\N\W}\\
J_{\F\N} & J_{\F\F} & J_{\F\K} & J_{\F\W}\\
J_{\K\N} & J_{\K\F} & J_{\K\K} & 0\\
J_{\W\N} & J_{\W\F} & 0 & J_{\W\W}
\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{c}
X_{\N}\\
X_{\F}\\
X_{\K}\\
X_{\W}
\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{c}
S_{\N}\\
S_{\F}\\
S_{\K}\\
S_{\W}
\end{array}\right]
\]
\[
\left[\begin{array}{ccc}
J_{\V\V} & J_{\V\K} & J_{\V\W}\\
J_{\K\V} & J_{\K\K} & 0\\
J_{\W\V} & 0 & J_{\W\W}
\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{c}
X_{\V}\\
X_{\K}\\
X_{\W}
\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{c}
S_{\V}\\
S_{\K}\\
S_{\W}
\end{array}\right]
\]

$J_{\K\K}=\left[J_{kk}\right]_{k\in\K}$ is block diagonal

\[
J_{\K\V}X_{\V}+J_{\K\K}X_{\K}=S_{\K}
\]
\noindent\fbox{\begin{minipage}[t]{1\columnwidth - 2\fboxsep - 2\fboxrule}%
\[
X_{\K}=J_{\K\K}^{-1}\left(S_{\K}-J_{\K\V}X_{\V}\right)
\]
%
\end{minipage}}

\begin{align*}
J_{\V\V}X_{\V}+J_{\V\W}X_{\W}=S_{\V}-J_{\V\K}J_{\K\K}^{-1}\left(S_{\K}-J_{\K\V}X_{\V}\right)\\
J_{\W\V}X_{\V}+J_{\W\W}X_{\W}=S_{\W}
\end{align*}

\noindent\fbox{\begin{minipage}[t]{1\columnwidth - 2\fboxsep - 2\fboxrule}%
\[
\left[\begin{array}{cc}
J_{\V\V}-J_{\V\K}J_{\K\K}^{-1}J_{\K\V} & J_{\V\W}\\
J_{\W\V} & J_{\W\W}
\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{c}
X_{\V}\\
X_{\W}
\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{c}
S_{\V}-J_{\V\K}J_{\K\K}^{-1}S_{\K}\\
S_{\W}
\end{array}\right]
\]
%
\end{minipage}}

Let's introduce:
\[
\beta=J_{\V\K}J_{\K\K}^{-1}
\]

\[
\left[\begin{array}{cc}
J_{\V\V}-\beta J_{\K\V} & J_{\V\W}\\
J_{\W\V} & J_{\W\W}
\end{array}\right]\left[\begin{array}{c}
X_{\V}\\
X_{\W}
\end{array}\right]=\left[\begin{array}{c}
S_{\V}-\beta S_{\K}\\
S_{\W}
\end{array}\right]
\]

We have:
\[
\beta=\left[\beta_{\nu k}\right]_{\nu\in\V,k\in\K}
\]
\[
\beta_{\nu k}=J_{\nu k}J_{kk}^{-1}
\]
and:
\[
\beta J_{\K\V}=\left[\sum_{k\in\K}J_{\nu k}J_{kk}^{-1}J_{k\nu'}\right]_{\left(\nu,\nu'\right)\in\V^{2}}
\]

Then with:
\[
B_{\nu k}=\left(J_{\nu k}J_{kk}^{-1}\right)^{T}
\]
It comes :
\[
S_{\V}-J_{\V\K}J_{\K\K}^{-1}S_{\K}=\left[S_{\nu}-\sum_{k\in\K}B_{\nu k}^{T}S_{k}\right]_{\nu\in\V}
\]

\[
J_{\V\V}-\beta J_{\K\V}=\left[J_{\nu\nu'}-\sum_{k\in\K}B_{\nu k}^{T}J_{k\nu'}\right]_{\left(\nu,\nu'\right)\in\V^{2}}
\]

\end{document}
